# PKDisbursementError.Code.recipientContactInvalidError

**Case**

The recipient’s contact information wasn’t valid.

## Declaration

```swift
case recipientContactInvalidError
```

## Error codes

- **PKDisbursementError.Code.unsupportedCardError**: The framework doesn’t support the card the individual presented.
- **PKDisbursementError.Code.unknownError**: An unknown error occurred.
